column4: Hi, general question, ubuntu alternative install command line system install uses same ram as full graphical install after boot, why is that, is x11 loaded in ram anyways in console only?
Hi, general question, ubuntu alternative install command line system install uses same ram as full graphical install after boot, why is that, is x11 loaded in ram anyways in console only?
The alternate install installs the same software as the regular desktop install. So it installs X as well.
Or ubuntu-minimal, but that really is lacking in default packages.
